Title: Welcome to Republic City
Director: Joaquim Dos Santos, Ki Hyun Ryu
Writer: Bryan Konietzko (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino (creator), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko
Actors: Janet Varney, J.K. Simmons, Mindy Sterling, Steve Blum
Plot: Korra, the new Avatar, travels to Republic city to start her Airbending training.
